name: Spacer
description:
Hello there!

This is my little project called "Spacer" where you controll a space ship to shoot them pesky UFO's

Controls

- WASD is for moving

- Space/Left mouse is for shooting

- Escape will go back or pause the game

my trello

I started redoing the game and here is how far i already got :D

the video is out of date now and i still need to add tons to the new version
